snippet: Nigeria’s Ministry of Defense said President Goodluck Jonathan has ordered the release of 167 people who were arrested during a military campaign to end an Islamist insurgency in the northeast.
abstract: Nigerian Pres Goodluck Jonathan orders the release of 167 people who were arrested during a military campaign to end an Islamist insurgency in the northeast.
lead_paragraph: Nigeria’s Ministry of Defense said President Goodluck Jonathan has ordered the release of 167 people who were arrested during a military campaign to end an Islamist insurgency in the northeast.
